segments.text: I can’t believe how messy this kitchen is getting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring everywhere, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing a plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are making it worse by climbing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet the cabinets are already warping from all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a mess, inside and out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’d be furious if this were my kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off the faucet before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s apron is going to be soaked in no time.
segments.speaker: PAR
